strings.Value: {g|Stability3_2}[Choice effects]{/g} "Set up additional guard posts and keep the locals away from conflict with the fairies."
{g|Stability3_1}[Choice effects]{/g} "Fairies don't attack for no reason. We've invaded their lands. Help the locals pull up their roots and take them to another area."
{g|Stability3_3}[Choice effects]{/g} "Wipe them out, Regongar. I don't want to hear about these fairies again."
"Make your own decision."

{n}Kesten is as black as thunder.{/n} "{mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}, there's a disaster in {g|Narlmarches}Narlmarches{/g}. Suddenly a group of fairies came out of the forest to the edge of the swamps. They're a vicious tribe – fitting their reputation perfectly."

"Until recently they merely toyed with the locals. – Pounded on their roofs at night, threw their boots up in the trees. But now they've started spoiling the cattle and trying to lure the people into the woods! We need to put an end to this, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}!"
"We shouldn't just go attack the fairies, of course. – They haven't done anything yet that would warrant such a response. But increasing the guard would help."
{n}Ekun nods at you.{/n} "We have fairies, {name}. They wander the {g|Narlmarches}Narlmarches{/g}, along the border. They refuse to leave. They say the lands are theirs. Your people are frightened."
{n}The man cringes and shakes his head.{/n} "The fairies are an old tribe. They have their rules, and we must honor them. Order your subjects to leave this land or there will be war."
"Certainly, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}."
{n}Regongar smiles angrily.{/n} "Good news finally! My guys were getting bored at their posts, but we've just now gotten word about a chance to stretch our bones!"

"Some fairies showed up near the settlements in the {g|Narlmarches}Narlmarches{/g}. – And not just showed up. They're pushing our people back, saying they're driving invaders from their lands. Do you know what that means?"
{n}Regongar squints.{/n} "It means we can gather a team and crush those pipsqueaks. Give this job to my guys – and you can forget about this problem forever!"
"Senseless. People will die. Fairies too. And for what? A piece of land?" {n}Ekun shakes his head.{/n}
{n}Regongar sighs disappointedly.{/n} "And we could have had so much fun..."
"You know, I'm loyal to you forever, but the people won't like this decision. To be honest, I don't like it either, but an order is an order."
{n}Ekun silently nods.{/n}
{n}Regongar's smile turns into a grin.{/n} "So we put our tail between our legs and run? From freaking fairies?!" {n}The words of the half-orc turn into an angry growl.{/n}
"Ha ha ha ha hmmmmm... I knew you would appreciate my plan!"
"I assure you, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}, the guard won't allow any fighting. And we won't allow some fairies to terrorize your subjects."
"I will lead the people away from there. I know of a place they could move to, near {g|Lake Silverstep}Silverstep{/g}."
{n}Regongar's eyes flare.{/n} "Let the hunt begin!"
